title: Emerald & Diamond Chandbali Jhumka - "Paccha Vaiduryala Kundanalu"
features: Intricate filigree Chandbali design inspired by Mughal art and South Indian temple architecture. Features square-cut Emeralds at the top, surrounded by brilliant-cut diamonds. A central oval Emerald is the focal point, with delicate diamond latticework and pearl drops at the bottom. Fine engraving detailing in the gold adds to the regal look.
colors: and Creamy White Pearls create a harmonious color palette.
occasions: and formal events. Perfect for a bride's trousseau or as a statement piece for any special occasion. Can be worn with traditional silk sarees or modern ethnic attire.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship that reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry tradition. The use of high-quality Zambian Emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The combination of traditional Chandbali design with modern diamond setting creates a unique and timeless piece. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, warm glow, enhancing its elegance.
